metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36313 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.7. The KVM subsystem allows out-of-range access to memslots after a deletion, aka CID-0774a964ef56. This affects arch/s390/kvm/kvm-s390.c, include/linux/kvm_host.h, and virt/kvm/kvm_main.c.
